Sequence Information.Peptide Name: EcAMP3 (E. crus-galli AMP 3; Arg-rich; natural AMPs; hairpin-like peptides; 2S=S; plants; UCSS1a)

Literature Information.Literature: Proteins and peptides were isolated from crushed seeds by acidic extraction followed by acetone precipitation and fractionation using a variety of liquid chromatography methods. 45.9% similar toEcAMP2isolated from the same plant. Also similar to plant EcAMP1, MBP-1, and Tk-AMP-X2.Activity: EcAMP3 is active against plant fungal pathogens, including F. graminearum (IC50 5.5 uM), F. oxysporum (IC50 9.6 uM), A. niger (IC50 22.4 uM), and B. sorokiniana (IC50 15 uM). The peptide can be cleaved by trypsin.
Literature Information.Author: Ryazantsev DY, Rogozhin EA, Dimitrieva TV, Drobyazina PE, Khadeeva NV, Egorov TA, Grishin EV, Zavriev SK.2014
Literature Information.Title: A novel hairpin-like antimicrobial peptide from barnyard grass (Echinochloa crusgalli L.) seeds: Structure-functional and molecular-genetics characterization
